vAccordion

AngularJS multi-level accordion component.

Works with (or without) ng-repeat

{{ ::pane.header }}

{{ ::pane.content }}

{{ ::subpane.header }}

{{ ::subpane.content }}

Allows multiple sections open at once

{{ ::pane.header }}

{{ ::pane.content }}

{{ ::subpane.header }}

{{ ::subpane.content }}
